commit message: [Experimental] Connect to the billing service from each activity, not from the application
Cache RunningTasks instance in a soft link
Add a few JavaDocs for Build.java

Keyguard clean-up & fixes

1. Take options mechanism from the ActiveModeService.
2. Make notification presenter handle possible wake-up before any others
do.

PS: Keyguard is broken from the inside by its idea. There's no way for a
stable custom keyguard.
Animate scene switching only if the container is laid out
Reverse icon's color without making it gray-ish
Fix issue #42 (make action's text & icon white)
